description: This file defines a data model for movie scripts using Pydantic, sets up an agent to generate structured movie script outputs, and runs the agent with a sample input.

classes.name: MovieScript
classes.description: A Pydantic model representing the structure of a movie script, including fields for name, setting, ending, genre, characters, and storyline.

methods.name: structured_output_agent
methods.description: An agent configured to generate movie scripts based on a specified model and description.

methods.name: structured_output_response
methods.description: The response object obtained after running the agent synchronously with the input 'New York'.
